title: (x) Humanist, curvaceous sans serif in Silverjet ad - Foco {Marc O}
content:
Does anyone know this one? I love the T and A.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Poster Type.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20070620185333/http:/typophile.com/files/Poster%20Type.jpg) | 59.03 KB |
author: Sam Serif

comments.content: Reminds me of [Halvorsen](http://web.archive.org/web/20070620185333/http:/www.veer.com/partner/link.aspx?i=1048&c=4&p=products/typedetail.aspx?image=UMT0000253) and [FF Strada](http://web.archive.org/web/20070620185333/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=strada). Could be that Silverjet got their own type made, but they use [FF DIN](http://web.archive.org/wiki/FF%20DIN) on [their website](http://web.archive.org/web/20070620185333/http:/flysilverjet.com/).

This is Foco, from Dalton Maag:

[http://www.daltonmaag.com/browse/fonts/dama/foco](http://web.archive.org/web/20070620185333/http:/www.daltonmaag.com/browse/fonts/dama/foco)
